member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.NuGetPublisher.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the function to return the NuGet source URL, based on the specified branch name.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.NuGetPublisher.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the function to return the NuGet API key, based on the specified branch name.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.NuGetPublisher.PublishAsSnupkg
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to publish in the new SNupkg package format.

member.name: M:Cake.Tasks.Config.PublisherExtensions.AddNuGetPackage(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Cake.Tasks.Config.Publisher},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Publishes the specified project as a NuGet package.
member.param: The NuGet source feed URL to publish to.
Optional API key to the NuGet source feed.
True to publish the package using the new SNUPKG format.
member.returns: The instance of the created class.
